title: Our leadership encourages people and does not command or control them.
Our leadership maintains ongoing awareness of priorities and redirects resources accordingly.
Our Family Office maintains awareness of its identity and makes modifications to policies to ensure all functions mirror Family Values.
Our Family Office is high-functioning and self-governing. There is an optimal level of involvement from Family members.
Our Family Office is evolving by implementing innovative strategies that involve cutting-edge hybrid workforce and digital workplace.
Our Family Office is focused on using the most up-to date technology, which enables new solutions and processes to be rapidly deployed.
Our Family Office has an investment policy that is reviewed at least annually.

We track new investment classes and reallocate capital when we see opportunity. Our planning, budgeting and resource allocation processes are flexible and frequent, and allow us to quickly shift resources.
Our Family Office is using an agile investment team design and has structured efficient and effective strategies to reach targeted goals.
Cybersecurity risks, other data privacy risks and fraud risks are monitored in an ongoing way, which enables a timely response to threats.
Our Family Office appeals to, inspires, and sustains talent to ensure our Family Office has the most skilled professionals to build and maintain an agile platform for our Family Office.

Our Family Office Governance Model includes a healthy appetite for, and an appropriate level of exposure to risk and uncertainty; members are creative, motivated, and enthusiastic to accomplish excellence.
